person.content:

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

2. semifinals: This refers to the semifinal matches or rounds of the tournament. It is not an organization, but rather a part of the tournament structure.
3. on Saturday: This is not an organization, but rather a specific day of the week when the semifinals are taking place.
4. : This is a punctuation mark and does not represent an organization.
